about_the_game:
ESCAPE SITE 13

Urgent Notice: Risks Involved in Exploring “Collection Item 229”

Despite deploying every available scientific method and research tool, the Research Institute remains unable to unravel the mystery of the enigmatic "Site 13." What little we know comes from the staggering collection of action records retrieved by Agent Liu Zhiming. These records—fragmented, like messages from a doomed island—each tell their own conflicting truths. Liu’s chilling words linger in our minds: “All records are true, for this place is forever His armor.”

Agent Liu is known for his unwavering honesty—his reports are not exaggerations. Now, the weight of interpreting these cryptic transmissions falls to us, the Communications Department.

ESCAPE SITE 13 transports players into a shadow-drenched, side-scrolling adventure inspired by the cryptic world of SCP containment lore. It unfolds in an original universe, picking up threads from SCP-1730, but weaving its own dark narrative. Players step into the shoes of Investigator Liu Zhiming, who must brave the newly unearthed structure dubbed "Site 13." As Liu, you will collect forgotten documents, decipher ancient puzzles, and uncover a labyrinthine history that has been buried in the dark for too long. With its immersive storytelling and richly detailed lore, ESCAPE SITE 13 invites both die-hard SCP fans and newcomers alike to plunge into the chaos of a secret that refuses to stay hidden.

In the aftermath of a catastrophic landslide, triggered by relentless downpours, a colossal mountain crumbles, revealing something that was never meant to be found: a sprawling, hidden facility buried within the rock. The Research Institute quickly names this mysterious discovery the "Hanging Coffin," and dispatches investigative teams to unlock its secrets. Yet, before they can even breach the entrance, the teams are crippled by unseen forces—memetic anomalies that attack the mind and leave their victims incapacitated.

In a desperate move, the Institute assembles the "Yu Gong" team, a group specifically chosen for their immunity to these mental assaults. However, their strength lies not in battle, but in their resilience. Their only hope rests in their leader, codename "Liezi"—the player-controlled Investigator Liu Zhiming.

As the team ventures deeper into the darkness of Site 13, they encounter horrors beyond comprehension. From the grotesque, ever-hungry "Leech Boy" to the twisted, unnatural distortions of space itself, the site becomes an ever-shifting maze of terror. What awaits them in the depths of this forsaken structure? What malevolent force caused the disasters that brought Site 13 into the light after all these years? Only through exploration, ingenuity, and survival will these answers be revealed—if they can be survived at all.

The haunting atmosphere of ESCAPE SITE 13 blends elements of suspense, mystery, and the macabre, immersing players in a world where reality bends, and nightmares become tangible. As Liu Zhiming, you are not just an investigator; you are the key to unlocking a truth that others have died trying to uncover. Will you piece together the shattered history of Site 13, or will you too become just another record lost in its endless depths?
